CoreUpdater.ClickHereToViewSqlQueries: Click here to view and copy the list of SQL queries that will get executed
CoreUpdater.CreatingBackupOfConfigurationFile: Creating a backup of the configuration file in %s
CoreUpdater.CriticalErrorDuringTheUpgradeProcess: Critical Error during the update process:
CoreUpdater.EmptyDatabaseError: Database %s is empty. You must edit or remove your Piwik configuration file.
CoreUpdater.ErrorDIYHelp: If you are an advanced user and encounter an error in the database upgrade:
CoreUpdater.ErrorDIYHelp_1: identify and correct the source of the problem (e.g., memory_limit or max_execution_time)
CoreUpdater.ErrorDIYHelp_2: execute the remaining queries in the update that failed
CoreUpdater.ErrorDIYHelp_3: manually update the `option` table in your Piwik database, setting the value of version_core to the version of the failed update
CoreUpdater.ErrorDIYHelp_4: re-run the updater (through the browser or command-line) to continue with the remaining updates
CoreUpdater.ErrorDIYHelp_5: report the problem (and solution) so that Piwik can be improved
CoreUpdater.ExceptionAlreadyLatestVersion: Your Piwik version %s is up to date.
CoreUpdater.ExceptionArchiveIncomplete: Archive is incomplete: some files are missing (eg. %s).
CoreUpdater.FeedbackRequest: Feel free to share your ideas and suggestions with the Piwik Team here:
CoreUpdater.HelpMessageContent: Check the %1$s Piwik FAQ %2$s which explains most common errors during update. %3$s Ask your system administrator - they may be able to help you with the error which is most likely related to your server or MySQL setup.
CoreUpdater.HelpMessageIntroductionWhenError: The above is the core error message. It should help explain the cause, but if you require further help please:
CoreUpdater.HelpMessageIntroductionWhenWarning: The update completed successfuly, however there were issues during the process. Please read the above descriptions for details. For further help:
CoreUpdater.HighTrafficPiwikServerEnableMaintenance: If you manage a high traffic Piwik server, we recommend to %smomentarily disable visitor Tracking and put the Piwik User Interface in maintenance mode%s.
CoreUpdater.IncompatbilePluginsWillBeDisabledInfo: Note: some plugins are not compatible with Piwik %s. They will be disabled when you upgrade:
CoreUpdater.MajorUpdateWarning1: This is a major update! It will take longer than usual.
CoreUpdater.MajorUpdateWarning2: The following advice is especially important for large installations.
CoreUpdater.NoteForLargePiwikInstances: Important notes for large Piwik installations
CoreUpdater.NoteItIsExpectedThatQueriesFail: Note: if you manually execute these queries, it is expected that some of them fail. In this case, simply ignore the errors, and run the next ones in the list.
CoreUpdater.NotificationClickToUpdatePlugins: Click here to update your plugins now:
CoreUpdater.NotificationClickToUpdateThemes: Click here to update your themes now:
CoreUpdater.NotificationSubjectAvailablePluginUpdate: Updates available for your Piwik plugins
CoreUpdater.PiwikWillBeUpgradedFromVersionXToVersion: Piwik database will be upgraded from version %1$s to the new version %2$s.
CoreUpdater.TheFollowingPluginsWillBeUpgradedX: The following plugins will be updated: %s.
CoreUpdater.TheFollowingDimensionsWillBeUpgradedX: The following dimensions will be updated: %s.
CoreUpdater.ThereIsNewPluginVersionAvailableForUpdat: Some plugins you use have been updated on the Marketplace:
CoreUpdater.ThereIsNewVersionAvailableForUpdate: There is a new version of Piwik available for update
CoreUpdater.TheUpgradeProcessMayFailExecuteCommand: If you have a large Piwik database, updates might take too long to run in the browser. In this situation, you can execute the updates from your command line: %s
CoreUpdater.TheUpgradeProcessMayTakeAWhilePleaseBePa: The database upgrade process may take a while, so please be patient.
CoreUpdater.UpdateHasBeenCancelledExplanation: Piwik One Click Update has been cancelled. If you can't fix the above error message, it is recommended that you manually update Piwik. %1$s Please check out the %2$sUpdate documentation%3$s to get started!
CoreUpdater.WeAutomaticallyDeactivatedTheFollowingPl: We automatically deactivated the following plugins: %s
CoreUpdater.YouCanUpgradeAutomaticallyOrDownloadPack: You can update to version %s automatically or download the package and install it manually:
CoreUpdater.YouCouldManuallyExecuteSqlQueries: If you are not able to use the command line updater and if Piwik fails to upgrade (due to a timeout of the database, a browser timeout, or any other issue), you could manually execute the SQL queries to update Piwik.
CoreUpdater.YouMustDownloadPackageOrFixPermissions: Piwik is unable to overwrite your current installation. You can either fix the directory/file permissions, or download the package and install version %s manually:
CoreUpdater.YourDatabaseIsOutOfDate: Your Piwik database is out-of-date, and must be upgraded before you can continue.
